BUY a Proxxon hotwire cutter:
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

USA - http://amzn.to/2lVNvEM 
Canada - http://amzn.to/2pWazXF


If you've struggled cutting dungeon tiles out of xps foam that are all the exact same size and perfectly square, this episode is for you. By following a few simple layout steps you can get really consistent square tiles whether you use a knife or a hotwire cutter. 














Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: How to Cut Perfect Foam Squares for Dungeon Tiles (Black Magic Craft Episode 059)
